title: [Twilight Lodge, Divination Room]
description: A four-tapered snowy owl chandelier hangs above the stage of a small, intimate amphitheater, where a low granite table rests.  Walls draped in twilight blue velvet curve to create a semicircular room with built-in tiered seating formed by several levels of steep steps.  Lavish silver-tasseled embroidered cushions lay casually around the dark carpeted floor on all levels, while two narrow staircases down the sides of the room provide easy access to the stage.

Walls draped in twilight blue velvet curve to create a semicircular, intimate amphitheater with two narrow staircases down the sides providing easy access to the stage.  Built-in tiered seating is formed by several levels of steep, darkly carpeted steps casually strewn with lavish silver-tasseled embroidered cushions on all levels.  A four-tapered snowy owl chandelier hangs above the stage where a low granite table rests.
